reviews.title: Out of time
reviews.comment: I wish there was more time
reviews.author: Shamahni Hetaraka

reviews.title: Ummm
reviews.comment: Maybe it\'s just me but the tutorials in this game suck
reviews.author: Rachel Cassidy-Cree

reviews.title: Had promise
reviews.comment: A game of blind luck, unless you get positive match on weapon AND link it to suspect AND have time to get suspects association to victim AND a motive then you cant get full marks on a case. And let me tell you something, with the amount of time you get this is highly unlikely. This game also involves nudity.
reviews.author: David Cunningham

reviews.title: Lacks story
reviews.comment: Its fun the first 2 times then it becomes redundant.  Great detail though.
reviews.author: Ali Nakhai

reviews.title: very nice
reviews.comment: bt finding a suspect feels difficult....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gross
reviews.comment: It\'s very graphic for kids 13 and under
reviews.author: A Google User
